mapper.select: select * from CIP_MEMBER order by NAME
select MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTH from MEMBER where MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER( MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_RESI) values ( #{MEMBER_SEQ}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_PW}, #{MEMBER_TEL}, #{MEMBER_BIRTH}, #{MEMBER_RESI})
